item.title: Aspose.BarCode for Reporting Services 23.10 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.BarCode for Reporting Services 23.10. All Changes Key Summary Category BARCODENET-38674 Add GS1MicroPdf417 with special GS1 modes Enhancement BARCODENET-38675 Add reading GS1MicroPdf417 with special GS1 modes Enhancement Public API and Backward Incompatible Changes New properties were added to Reporting Services component: Pdf417MacroECIEncoding; Pdf417MacroTerminator; MacroCharacters; IsLinked; IsCode128Emulation.

item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.BarCode for Reporting Services 23.8. item.title: Aspose.BarCode for Reporting Services 23.4 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.BarCode for Reporting Services 23.4. All Changes Key Summary Category BARCODEREP-142 Add support of Aspose.Barcode for Reporting Services to SSRS 2022 and VS2022 Enhancement Public API and Backward Incompatible Changes Support of Visual Studio 2022 was added to Aspose.Barcode for Reporting Services. Support of SQL Server Reporting Services 2022 was added to Aspose.

item.title: Aspose.BarCode for Reporting Services 23.3 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.BarCode for Reporting Services 23.3. All Changes Key Summary Category BARCODENET-38360 Add AntiAlias to barcode properties Enhancement Public API and Backward Incompatible Changes Added UseAntiAlias property to BarCode element for Reporting Services. Property UseAntiAlias indicates whether is used anti-aliasing mode to render image. Anti-aliasing mode is applied to barcode and text drawing.
